roleset.name: make too simple

example.name: intransitive
example.text: She said they have ``oversimplified and made some erroneous assumptions that make their analysis completely off-base.''

example.name: transitive, from simplify
example.text: RISC technology speeds up a computer by [*]oversimplifying the internal software.

roleset.note: OVERSIMPLIFY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'simplify' based on sentences in wsj. No access to verbnet at the moment. (from oversimplify.01-v predicate notes)
